title: #349: Psychological Warfare, Controlled Opposition and Police Ritual Murders with Manny Miranda
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode I welcome the Fringe Center's Manny Miranda to discuss BLM, the DNC's bizarro game plan, Jesuit order's connections to Mossad and the Vallejo Police Officers' alleged murder ritual! Thank you so much for your support!

Live shows:
Los Angeles: August 8th- Tin Foil Hat Podcast with Special Guest Monica Perez Live at the World Famous Comedy Show at 8pm!

Los Angeles: August 22nd- March against Child Sex Trafficking on Hollywood at Vine at 10am

Appleton Wisconsin: Sept 10th-12th at The Skyline Comedy Cafe
https://www.skylinecomedy.com

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/FringeCenterPodcast
